title: Bagels on Broadway
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service bakery cafe offering primarily bagel sandwiches. The bagels are made without egg but some have cheese. Vegans could get the Mediterranean sandwich or ask to omit cheese in the vegetarian one. Or customize your own sandwich with choice bagel, spread, vegetables. No vegan cream cheese as of Nov 2014.
